Index.meta_description: Engimetric is an open-source platform for tracking and analyzing engineering performance, with a hosted option available.

Hero.title: Streamline Your <important>Engineering Metrics</important> with Precision
Hero.description: Open-source platform with a hosted option. Monitor team metrics, integrate seamlessly, and generate insightful summaries with AI-powered reporting.

Features.section_description: Track and analyze team metrics with seamless integrations and AI-generated reports.
Features.feature1_description: Seamlessly integrate with tools like GitHub, Jira, and Zoom to streamline your team's workflows and centralize performance data.
Features.feature2_description: Keep your data up-to-date with automated syncing across all connected integrations, ensuring real-time accuracy.
Features.feature3_description: Dive deeper into your data with expandable metric tables, providing granular insights per integration and team member.
Features.feature4_description: Deploy Engimetric on your infrastructure for maximum control, data privacy, and customization.
Features.feature5_description: Leverage AI-generated summaries to uncover key insights, trends, and actionable recommendations across your team's performance.
Features.feature6_description: Built to scale with your team, Engimetric supports growing datasets, multiple integrations, and increased performance demands without compromise.

Pricing.section_description: Use Engimetric on your own servers or opt for a hosted version with seamless support.

FAQ.question: What integrations are supported?
FAQ.answer: Currently, GitHub is supported as a proof of concept. Future integrations include Jira, Zoom, and more.

CTA.title: Start Tracking Your Engineering Metrics Today
CTA.description: Set up your team, sync integrations, and start generating insights.

ProtectFallback.not_enough_permission: You donâ€™t have the required permissions to perform this action.

Dashboard.meta_description: Monitor, analyze, and optimize your engineering team's performance.

DashboardIndex.message_state_description: Link your team members and sync metrics effortlessly.

UserProfile.title_bar_description: Manage your personal account settings and preferences.

PricingModel.self_hosted: Free - All features included, self-managed hosting.
PricingModel.hosted: $9-$19/month - Fully managed hosting with all features included.
PricingModel.enterprise: $99+/month - Dedicated hosting, SLA-backed support, all features included.
